Cyclonus turned away from Hydras and looked back at =
the computer
screen. "I have had someone watching the Ark while I came here=
 to meet
you." Cyclonus said carefully without turning from the screen. "He=
 is
sending us a visual image of what is going on there."

Cylonus pointed =
to the screen, "Is this the Nightshift you are talking about?"

The screen =
showed Tuscon's fallen form, half transformed, as well as
the image of Nigh=
tshift limping away from the battle scene. Next to
Tuscon is a small Autobo=
t Icon, while next to Nightshift a definite
purple Decepticon icon appears.=
 Also in the image can be seen Kup as
he is attempting do battle with the e=
scaping Nightshift, a discreet
Autobot symbol appearing next to him.

"I ha=
ve not had time to acquaint myself with the entire battle and
where this Ni=
ghtshift came from, as I only came in after it started,
but I wanted to be =
sure that this is he before we rescue him."
Cyclonus looked back at Hydras,=
 "Despite their claims of honor and

quite devious."
